moves.2... h5: I enforce a plan I have executed many times
moves.3. b4 Bg4: Ta-da! A particular favorite of mine
moves.5. Bxg4: He takes, but now I can get my rook foward
moves.6. Bb2 d4 7. Ne2 d3: I am in a great attacking position here
moves.8. cxd3 Qxd3: Now my queen is in the game
moves.13... O-O-O: Argh! Why did I do that?
moves.14. Bxh8 Nxb4: I try to make the most of the situation
moves.16. Rxa7: But he is quick to react
moves.16... Kb8 17. Ra2: He puts pressure on my knight
moves.17... Nb4: I plan to keep attacking his rook
I move my rook foward to keep it out of danger
moves.24... Nh6: I get my knight out of there
moves.25. Bg7 Nc5: I try to take his rook
moves.27... Rxe6: I basically give up and start taking pawns
moves.28. Nf4: !!!! He has just allowed me to checkmate him
moves.28... Re1#: It was a nice match that shows never give up
